title: A short treatise of dialling shewing, the making of all sorts of sun-dials, horizontal, erect, direct, declining, inclining, reclining; vpon any flat or plaine superficies, howsoeuer placed, with ruler and compasse onely, without any arithmeticall calculation. By Edvvard Wright.
author: Wright, Edward, 1558?-1615.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Iohn Beale for William Welby,
